insertDocument: insert into document (document_type_id, document_nu) values ($1, $2) returning document_id
insertPerson: INSERT INTO person (person_na, person_lna, person_eml, person_dir, document_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5) RETURNING person_id
insertUser: INSERT INTO public.user (username, password, person_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
